categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars Adventure Journal 17

nodes.text: Patrol 1138 was a five-man patrol of Imperial soldiers assigned to the base on Laertos. The team was ambushed by T'Charek Haathi and her team, who stole their identities and equipment to infiltrate the base.
Patrol 1138 is one of many references throughout Star Wars media to George Lucas' first feature film, THX 1138.
